EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi guys!
Just a final reminder for the event on Saturday! Thanks so much again for signing up!
Here is the Eventbrite link! If you could arrive for 13:30 that would be great.
The afternoon will involve talking to our guests, playing games, getting to know the older people of Reading and eating some afternoon tea!
See you there!
Amy
